thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and service
thread.title_full: Great location and service - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: amandapD4299QK
title: Great location and service
text: This has been my 10th or so stay in New York, my second in this hotel. Great location - close to many tourist destinations, but away from the craziness of Times Square. Plenty of shops and food nearby and less than a block from the subway. Great staff - clean rooms.
